BICLab/SpikingBrain-7B

brain-inspired language model with spiking neurons, efficient attention, and MoE modules for ultra-long context processing

Related repos

  • Framework for language agents with cognitive architectures
  • efficient attention for long-context LLMs
  • Synthesizes speech without tokenizers
  • AI chat app with branching conversations, file uploads, plugin support, and local model options
  • Builds voice agents for phone calls with FastRTC and Twilio
  • Data analysis platform using large language models
  • parallel training for language models with dataset prep and programmatic access
  • open-source language and vision models with huge context window and hybrid attention
  • Muon optimizer for training large language models
